entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: E 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with ice pellets changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
